languages.text: "Астероид, на котором расположен "Адептус Амасекус", оцеплен, но мои блюстители доставят тебя туда. Я хочу, чтобы ты выманил{mf||а} Владайма из норы и схватил{mf||а} его, чтобы он мог предстать перед судом. Сверши это дело во имя освобождения Футфола от греха, проложи дорогу моему правосудию".

traits.locale_text: "Астероид, на котором расположен "Адептус Амасекус", оцеплен, но мои блюстители доставят тебя туда. Я хочу, чтобы ты выманил{mf||а} Владайма из норы и схватил{mf||а} его, чтобы он мог предстать перед судом. Сверши это дело во имя освобождения Футфола от греха, проложи дорогу моему правосудию".
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "The asteroid where the Adeptus Amasecus is located has been cordoned off, but my enforcer will take you there. I want you to lure Tocara out of his hole and seize him so that he may stand trial. Do this for the sake of Footfall's liberation and pave the road that my justice will tread."
languages.original_text: "Астероид, на котором расположен "Адептус Амасекус", оцеплен, но мои блюстители доставят тебя туда. Я хочу, чтобы ты выманил{mf||а} Владайма из норы и схватил{mf||а} его, чтобы он мог предстать перед судом. Сверши это дело во имя освобождения Футфола от греха, проложи дорогу моему правосудию".

I want you to lure Tocara out of his hole and seize him so that he may stand trial. Do this for the sake of Footfall's liberation and pave the road that my justice will tread."

I want you to lure Tocara out of his hole and seize him so that he may stand trial. Do this for the sake of Footfall's liberation and pave the road that my justice will tread."

traits.locale_text: "The asteroid where the Adeptus Amasecus is located has been cordoned off, but my enforcer will take you there. I want you to lure Tocara out of his hole and seize him so that he may stand trial. Do this for the sake of Footfall's liberation and pave the road that my justice will tread."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “艾玛赛克烈酒修会所在的小行星已经被封锁了，但我的执法者会带你过去。我们要把托卡拉从他的巢穴里引出来，抓住他，让他接受审判。为了落脚港的光明，为了我的正义之路，我必须这么做。”
languages.original_text: "The asteroid where the Adeptus Amasecus is located has been cordoned off, but my enforcer will take you there. I want you to lure Tocara out of his hole and seize him so that he may stand trial. Do this for the sake of Footfall's liberation and pave the road that my justice will tread."

traits.locale_text: “艾玛赛克烈酒修会所在的小行星已经被封锁了，但我的执法者会带你过去。我们要把托卡拉从他的巢穴里引出来，抓住他，让他接受审判。为了落脚港的光明，为了我的正义之路，我必须这么做。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「アデプトゥス・アマセックがある小惑星は封鎖されているが、エンフォーサーにお前を連れて行かせよう。お前には、トカラをおびき出して捕まえてほしい。そうすれば裁けるかもしれない。フットフォール解放の為に、そして私の正義の道を造るために協力してほしい」
languages.original_text: "The asteroid where the Adeptus Amasecus is located has been cordoned off, but my enforcer will take you there. I want you to lure Tocara out of his hole and seize him so that he may stand trial. Do this for the sake of Footfall's liberation and pave the road that my justice will tread."

traits.locale_text: 「アデプトゥス・アマセックがある小惑星は封鎖されているが、エンフォーサーにお前を連れて行かせよう。お前には、トカラをおびき出して捕まえてほしい。そうすれば裁けるかもしれない。フットフォール解放の為に、そして私の正義の道を造るために協力してほしい」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «El asteroide en el que se encuentra el Adeptus Amasecus ha sido acordonado, pero mi guarda {mf|le|la} llevará hasta allí. Quiero que saque a Tocara de su agujero y lo detenga para que pueda ser juzgado. Hágalo por el bien de la liberación de Paso y allane el camino de mi justicia»,
languages.original_text: "The asteroid where the Adeptus Amasecus is located has been cordoned off, but my enforcer will take you there. I want you to lure Tocara out of his hole and seize him so that he may stand trial. Do this for the sake of Footfall's liberation and pave the road that my justice will tread."

traits.locale_text: «El asteroide en el que se encuentra el Adeptus Amasecus ha sido acordonado, pero mi guarda {mf|le|la} llevará hasta allí. Quiero que saque a Tocara de su agujero y lo detenga para que pueda ser juzgado. Hágalo por el bien de la liberación de Paso y allane el camino de mi justicia»,
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Der Asteroide, auf dem sich das Adeptus Amasecus befindet, wurde abgeriegelt. Meine Enforcers bringen Euch aber hin. Ich will Tocara aus seinem Loch locken und ihn ergreifen, damit er vor Gericht gestellt werden kann. Tut das, um Footfall zu befreien und die Straße zu ebnen, auf der meine Gerechtigkeit wandeln wird."
languages.original_text: "The asteroid where the Adeptus Amasecus is located has been cordoned off, but my enforcer will take you there. I want you to lure Tocara out of his hole and seize him so that he may stand trial. Do this for the sake of Footfall's liberation and pave the road that my justice will tread."

traits.locale_text: "Der Asteroide, auf dem sich das Adeptus Amasecus befindet, wurde abgeriegelt. Meine Enforcers bringen Euch aber hin. Ich will Tocara aus seinem Loch locken und ihn ergreifen, damit er vor Gericht gestellt werden kann. Tut das, um Footfall zu befreien und die Straße zu ebnen, auf der meine Gerechtigkeit wandeln wird."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « L'astéroïde sur lequel se trouve l'Adeptus Amasecus est actuellement interdit d'accès, mais mes prévôts vous y conduiront. Je veux que vous fassiez sortir Tocara de son trou et que vous le capturiez pour qu'il soit jugé. Faites-le au nom de la libération de Castel, pour paver la route qu'empruntera ma justice. »
languages.original_text: "The asteroid where the Adeptus Amasecus is located has been cordoned off, but my enforcer will take you there. I want you to lure Tocara out of his hole and seize him so that he may stand trial. Do this for the sake of Footfall's liberation and pave the road that my justice will tread."

traits.locale_text: « L'astéroïde sur lequel se trouve l'Adeptus Amasecus est actuellement interdit d'accès, mais mes prévôts vous y conduiront. Je veux que vous fassiez sortir Tocara de son trou et que vous le capturiez pour qu'il soit jugé. Faites-le au nom de la libération de Castel, pour paver la route qu'empruntera ma justice. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Adeptus Amasekus'un bulunduğu asteroidi kordona aldık ancak infazcılarım seni oraya götürecek. Tocara'yı saklandığı delikten çıkarmanı ve ele geçirip mahkemeye getirmeni istiyorum. Binliman'ın özgürleştirilmesi uğruna bu dediğimi yap. Böylece adaletimin yolu açılmış olacak."
languages.original_text: "The asteroid where the Adeptus Amasecus is located has been cordoned off, but my enforcer will take you there. I want you to lure Tocara out of his hole and seize him so that he may stand trial. Do this for the sake of Footfall's liberation and pave the road that my justice will tread."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Amasekus'un bulunduğu asteroit kordona alındı ancak infazcılarım seni oraya götürecek. Tocara'yı saklandığı delikten çıkarmanı ve ele geçirip mahkeme önüne getirmeni istiyorum. Binliman'ın özgürleştirilmesi uğruna bu dediğimi yap ve böylece adaletimin yolu açılmış olacak."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
